Subject: Active Directory Authentication - Syntax for the Active Directory Administrators Group parameter
Description:
Hello,
i am trying to configure the AD Sync for the EP Administrators. 
I configured all the parameters, and checking the connection with AD using the Test button, it works, i receive the following response: Connection Successful!
But trying to sync the AD Administrators using the "Sync AD Administrators" button, i receive the error: Group not found or no users present in group!

I tried different groups, also the built-in Domain Admins just as a test, with the same result.

Also, I tried different syntax (eg. using the pure group name, the Canonical Name, the DistinguishedName, but the result it is the same, with the error above.

The user used for the AD connection it is a domain admin.
I cannot find in the EP documentation which syntax i must use.

Could you give me a trick?

Thank you.
Massimo.
What_We_Know__c:
Customer have an issue with the Active Directory Authentication.
Assist the customer with details on how the AD authentication works and how our integration works.

All the steps performed lead us to a request to our R&D team.
Next_Steps__c: Provide to the customer the R&D response, in order for them to test and verify if the situation persist.
Solution_Comment__c:
Added the AD Auth setting as described by R&D.
AD Auth works now.
